# What is your Mobile App Security project?

Learn to build Certified Secure™ mobile app security in Android & iOS apps using Appdome's DevSecOps automation platform in your mobile CI/CD pipeline. Use Appdome to fully automate the build, test, release, and monitor lifecycle of Android & iOS mobile app security, RASP, anti-tampering, anti-debugging, app shielding, mobile code obfuscation, mobile data encryption, jailbreak and root detection, MiTM attack prevention, and more.
